text: Aziz and his team were fantastic. They did an event in Perth that was superbly put together. They are very professional in what they do and gave me great advice and recommendations. These guys are the real deal and I wouldn't hesitate to engage them again. Thanks Kawan Creative!

amazing group of professionals, Aziz and his team have been great at producing events both locally and internationally. They take event management to another level. They tailor make events for their clients big or small. Thanks Kawan for all the great events. Look forward to many more in the future.
I give 5 stars to creative friends, my greetings to you, bro, I'm from Batam.
